layout.no-page-error: The page you are looking for does not exist

landing.useful-functions: See what you can do with Badoone Drive
landing.about-heading: Easy and secure access to your content
landing.about-body: Store, share, and collaborate on files and folders from your mobile device, tablet, or computer
landing.warning-heading: Built-in protections against malware, spam, and ransomware
landing.warning-body: Drive can provide encrypted and secure access to your files. Files shared with you can be proactively scanned and removed when malware, spam, ransomware, or phishing is detected. And Drive is cloud-native, which eliminates the need for local files and can minimize risk to your devices.
landing.coop-heading: People-first collaboration apps to supercharge teamwork
landing.coop-body: Drive integrates with Docs, Sheets, and Slides, cloud-native collaboration apps that enable your team to create content and collaborate more effectively in real time.
landing.integration-heading: Integration with the tools and apps your team is already using
landing.integration-body: Drive integrates with and complements your team’s existing technology. Collaborate in Microsoft Office files without the need to convert file formats, and edit and store over 100 additional file types, including PDFs, CAD files, images, and more.
landing.search-heading: Google’s Search and AI technology helps your team move faster
landing.search-body: Google’s powerful search capabilities are embedded in Drive and offer speed, reliability, and collaboration. And features like Drive search chips help your team find files fast by quickly surfacing more relevant results.
landing.teams: Thousands of teams are already using Drive to revolutionize the way they work
landing.teams-salesforce: I never worry about finding a document. Everything’s in Drive, I can access it anywhere, and that’s been revolutionary.
landing.teams-cardinal: Most of our team members were already familiar with Drive and found it very intuitive and easy to use, so change management was minimal and we were quickly up and running.
landing.teams-ibotta: Real-time collaboration with Google Docs and Drive is a must-have...if we ever tried to move employees off it, it would be a torches and pitchforks situation—complete chaos.
landing.teams-atb: Google is revolutionizing collaboration and individual productivity through AI. Employees can focus more on creating value for our customers and less on mundane tasks.

explorer.dropfile: Drop files to upload them to:
